description:
October 1st, 1997: The END Day. Long after a savage war engulfs and destroys the world, Simea wakes from cryostasis
to find himself in a strange, post-apocalyptic world. Explore the land and fight against the Goa Empire in this
1990 NES action role-playing game.

v1.0.0.description:
Initial implementation of Crystalis' Archipelago integration.

### Usage Instructions
Download the .apworld file below and follow the standard procedure for using an unsupported APWorld.

### Known Issues

- Wh (shuffle houses), Wa (shuffle areas), and Wm (randomize maps) are not yet implemented
- Holding up after opening the chest dropped by the Giant Insect will screw up the graphics.
v1.0.0.title: Crystalis APWorld v1.0.0 - Initial Release

v1.0.1.description: Bugfix: The wall in Zebu's cave should have a fire-weak ice wall, not a wind-weak rock wall when wall elements are not randomized.
v1.0.1.title: v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description: Bugfix - make sure that when vanilla_wild_warp is set to out_of_logic, it's actually kept out of the logic.
v1.0.2.title: v1.0.2

v1.0.3.description: -Fixed logic error that made some glitches considered in-logic when they should just be enabled (but out-of-logic).
v1.0.3.title: v1.0.3

v2.0.0.description:
### New Features

- Now supports Wh as `shuffle_houses` and Wa as `shuffle_areas` (only compatible with AP 0.6.0 and later)
- Added plando options for entrances, boss weaknesses, wall elements, trade-ins, key item names, tool shop inventories, and wild warps.
- Added DeathLink support
- Added an error message that directs the user to the Crystalis Randomizer AP website if they attempt to patch via Archipelago, unless a patched .nes file with the same name as the patch is located in the same directory as the patch file, in which case it will load the patched ROM in BizHawk.

### Bug Fixes

- Fixed a couple of logic bugs that didn't actually matter until Wh and Wa were introduced.
- Fixed an issue that could rarely result in items being lost forever
- Fixed a bug with the screen scrolling breaking after opening the chest dropped by the Giant Insect
v2.0.0.title: Crystalis APWorld v2.0.0 - Now with entrance randomization!

v2.0.1.description:
# Bug Fixes:
- Prevent Portoa Castle's back entrance from being connected in a way where it should be locked (because it breaks the patcher)
# New "Features":
- Display the client APWorld version after validating the ROM
- Make sure all generation errors produced by this APWorld start with Crystalis: to make the error's source easier to identify
v2.0.1.title: v2.0.1

v2.0.2.title: v2.0.2
